overlay.disputeResolution: German courts with jurisdiction in company's registered seat

clauses.vestingLanguage: Founder shares shall vest according to the vesting schedule. German commercial law (HGB) applies.
clauses.ipAssignment: IP assignment must be explicitly documented. Employee inventions governed by Arbeitnehmererfindungsgesetz (Employee Inventions Act).
clauses.taxNotice: Founders should consult German tax advisor regarding income tax, trade tax (Gewerbesteuer), and social security implications.
clauses.companyFormation: Company typically formed as GmbH (Gesellschaft mit beschränkter Haftung) requiring notarization.
clauses.coDetTermination: German co-determination law (Mitbestimmungsgesetz) may apply as company grows.
